summary:
This simple mod changes all follower\'s dialogue to list the more important topics at the top.
The optional esp adds annihilatt0r\'s \"Follower Map Markers\". You can find his mod here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13798
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i109.photobucket.com/albums/n60/eagledude4/ScreenShot142.jpg[/IMG]

This simple mod changes all follower\'s dialogue to list the more important topics at the top.
The optional esp adds annihilatt0r\'s \"Follower Map Markers\". You can find his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13798]Here[/url].

This is how the dialogue now looks:
[list] 
[*]Get map marker (if using the optional esp)
[*]Wait here/Follow me
[*]Trade with me (changed from \"I need to trade some things with you\"
[*]I need you to do something
[*]It\'s time for us to part ways
[/list]


Please endorse my mod if you enjoyed it, and please post any comments/suggestions to help me make it even better!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]Better Follower Dialogue Priority is also on the Skyrim Workshop [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1731204]Here[/url].[/b]  

Also, check out my other mods!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10330]The Man Cave[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13718]Better Thieves Guild[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4319]Better Item Sorting[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15107]Better Leveling Merchants and Speechcraft[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15462]Better Map Marker Placements[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17020]No More Mine Pests[/url]
author: Eagledude4

files.name: Better Follower Dialogue with Follower Map Markers
